name: Storm Catcher
ability: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.

legacy.firstNightReminder: Name a good character. If in play, evil players learn who has it.

firstNight.description: Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.

information.customMessage: Name a good character; if in play, protect from non-execution death and reveal to evil.
